name: Hyperblade Demo
description:
Hyperblade is a fast, physics-based action game where you can only move by dashing and using your momentum to kick off walls. You must use these skills to escape a futuristic military complex with just a sword in hand. Abilities like time manipulation and bullet deflection allow for limitless improvisational play. 

Hyperblade is meant to give you a feeling of accomplishment and badassery upon defeating groups of armed enemies with tact and speed. Slow-motion and the smooth movement of the player-character also gives you a cinematic, yet challenging experience.

This is just a vertical slice of the game, and plenty more environments, art, and gameplay elements are indented for the final version.

Please consider filling out this feedback form, it would help a lot! https://forms.gle/a9CCAr4Pi8Kz4KWx9

INSTRUCTIONS

Simply download, extract zip, and run HyperbladeDemo.exe :)
